pullRequest.title: [Feature] Text Units
pullRequest.bodyText:
Checklist

 I tested all changes and all related features with different users (student, tutor, instructor, admin) on the test server https://artemistest.ase.in.tum.de.
 Server: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Server: I added multiple integration tests (Spring) related to the features (with a high test coverage)
 Server: I added @PreAuthorize and check the course groups for all new REST Calls (security)
 Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.
 Client: I followed the coding and design guidelines.
 Client: I added authorities to all new routes and check the course groups for displaying navigation elements (links, buttons)
 Client: I documented the TypeScript code using JSDoc style.
 Client: I added multiple screenshots/screencasts of my UI changes
 Client: I translated all the newly inserted strings into German and English

Motivation and Context


Description

This PR activates the text-unit feature in Artemis. TextUnits can be written in Markdown (image upload also supported) and will be rendered for the student as HTML. This feature allows instructors to move some of their lecture content from the traditional lecture slides as pdf fully into Artemis
Additional Features:

Changes to the Markdown get saved to the local storage so instructors do not lose their progress
There is a "open as popup" feature that opens the text unit content into a separate page. This allows for easy printing and printing to PDF for students who like to have everything as PDF.

Steps for Testing

Follow the videos described in the screenshot section and just test that everything works. Create, Update, Delete...
Test Coverage



Server:

Frontend:



Screenshots


Create Video: https://streamable.com/ujo76r
Cache Video: https://streamable.com/m7ryv8
Student View Video: https://streamable.com/5knqvk

commit.message: Created Basic Frontend Setup for Text Units
Finished Basic Implementation of Text Units
Increased size of popup to window sieze
